participant_1.background:

I love wearing skinny jeans and leggings.
My favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves.
My favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.
I am rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.background:
I walk three miles every day.
I love disneyland and mickey mouse.
I love to spend time with my family.
My favorite way to relax is to read a book.
I am a baby delivery nurse.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name]. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family, walk three miles every day, and read books.
That sounds really nice. I like to listen to music, play video games, and wear skinny jeans and leggings.
I love music too! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
I love rock music too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love a lot of bands, but my favorites are probably The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love them too.
What do you like about Disney?
I love the characters, the rides, and the atmosphere. It's always a fun place to visit.
I've never been to Disney before, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
